!========_ Version 1.1.0 _========!

°Fixed the position of the ripple when the document is scrolled
°Made the javascript more library-like: It now returns a ripple object with the registerRipples function




!========_ Version 1.1.1 _========!

°Updated the demo




!========_ Version 1.1.2 _========!

°Added the event section to the README




!========_ Version 1.2.0 _========!

°Scrolling now gets disabled while a ripple element is being pressed
°Improved the README




!========_ Version 1.2.1 _========!

°Scrolling no longer gets disabled




!========_ Version 1.3.0 _========!

°Bug with wrong ripple position fixed
°Performance improvements
°Added the ripple-cancel-on-move attribute
°You can unregister a ripple now by removing the ripple class




!========_ Version 1.3.1 _========!

°Bug where ripples would not start fixed




!========_ Version 1.4.0 _========!

°Added the function ripple(). Call it to start a ripple without user input
°Bug where ripple with the ripple-cancel-on-move attribute would cancel automatically fixed
°Changed Readme a bit
